metadata.title: CVE-2022-32742

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5

metadata.description: A flaw was found in Samba. Some SMB1 write requests were not correctly range-checked to ensure the client had sent enough data to fulfill the write, allowing server memory contents to be written into the file (or printer) instead of client-supplied data. The client cannot control the area of the server memory written to the file (or printer).

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3-BCL is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3-LTSS-TERADATA is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3-TERADATA is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4-ESPOS is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4-LTSS is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2-BCL is installed
